title: Hour 2 - Chris Simms (07-22-20)
itunes:title: Hour 2 - Chris Simms (07-22-20)
description:
Chris Simms tells Dan that when his Dad; Phil Simms lost a game; there would be no conversation in the car on the way home. Chris says that he thinks Tua and Burrows will have an advantage with no preseason because of where they played in college.
